items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Feed Readers

*   [Stringer (⭐4k)](https://github.com/stringer-rss/stringer) - Work-in-progress self-hosted, anti-social RSS reader. `MIT` `Ruby`

Software / Feed Readers

items.title: Awesome Pcaptools
items.content_text:
### Traffic Capture

*   [sharppcap (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/dotpcap/sharppcap): Fully managed, cross platform (Windows, Mac, Linux) .NET library for capturing packets from live and file based devices. A realiable and robust wrapper of libpcap and npcap.
items.content_html:
Traffic Capture

  • sharppcap (⭐1.4k): Fully managed, cross platform (Windows, Mac, Linux) .NET library for capturing packets from live and file based devices. A realiable and robust wrapper of libpcap and npcap.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Generic ZSH

*   [adamnorwood-zsh (⭐11)](https://github.com/adamnorwood/adamnorwood-zsh/) - A minimalist but readable ZSH setup based on [oh-my-posh](https://ohmyposh.dev/).

### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [quotify (⭐7)](https://github.com/dpretet/zsh-quotify) - Displays inspiring coding quotes from our pairs when starting up.
items.content_html:
Generic ZSH

  • adamnorwood-zsh (⭐11) - A minimalist but readable ZSH setup based on oh-my-posh.

Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • quotify (⭐7) - Displays inspiring coding quotes from our pairs when starting up.

items.title: Awesome List
items.content_text:
### Platforms

*   [ArcGIS Developer (⭐280)](https://github.com/Esri/awesome-arcgis-developer#readme) - Mapping and location analysis platform for developers.

### Back-End Development

*   [Fiber (⭐697)](https://github.com/gofiber/awesome-fiber#readme) - Web framework built on top of Fasthttp, the fastest HTTP engine for Go.

### Databases

*   [TDengine (⭐61)](https://github.com/taosdata/awesome-tdengine#readme) - An open-source time-series database with high-performance, scalability, and SQL support.

### Security

*   [Malware Persistence (⭐227)](https://github.com/Karneades/awesome-malware-persistence#readme) - Techniques that adversaries use to keep access to systems across restarts.
*   [EVM Security (⭐179)](https://github.com/kareniel/awesome-evm-security#readme) - Understanding the Ethereum Virtual Machine security ecosystem.

### Content Management Systems

*   [Plone (⭐66)](https://github.com/collective/awesome-plone#readme) - Open source Python CMS.

### Hardware

*   [Open Hardware (⭐574)](https://github.com/delftopenhardware/awesome-open-hardware#readme) - Open-source hardware projects.

### Miscellaneous

*   [OpenStreetMap (⭐772)](https://github.com/osmlab/awesome-openstreetmap#readme) - An open data mapping project utilized by many apps and devices.
*   [Computational Biology (⭐95)](https://github.com/inoue0426/awesome-computational-biology#readme) - Computational approaches applied to problems in biology.
items.content_html:
Platforms

  • ArcGIS Developer (⭐280) - Mapping and location analysis platform for developers.

Back-End Development

  • Fiber (⭐697) - Web framework built on top of Fasthttp, the fastest HTTP engine for Go.

Databases

  • TDengine (⭐61) - An open-source time-series database with high-performance, scalability, and SQL support.

Security

  • Malware Persistence (⭐227) - Techniques that adversaries use to keep access to systems across restarts.
  • EVM Security (⭐179) - Understanding the Ethereum Virtual Machine security ecosystem.

Content Management Systems

  • Plone (⭐66) - Open source Python CMS.

Hardware

  • Open Hardware (⭐574) - Open-source hardware projects.

Miscellaneous

  • OpenStreetMap (⭐772) - An open data mapping project utilized by many apps and devices.
  • Computational Biology (⭐95) - Computational approaches applied to problems in biology.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Color / Diagnostics

*   [koenverburg/peepsight.nvim (⭐118)](https://github.com/koenverburg/peepsight.nvim) - Focus only the function your cursor is in.

### Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

*   [theniceboy/nvim-deus (⭐72)](https://github.com/theniceboy/nvim-deus) - Vim-deus with Tree-sitter support.

### Utility / Diagnostics

*   [crusj/bookmarks.nvim (⭐240)](https://github.com/crusj/bookmarks.nvim) - Remember file locations and sort by time and frequency.
*   [xiyaowong/virtcolumn.nvim (⭐94)](https://github.com/xiyaowong/virtcolumn.nvim) - Display a line as colorcolumn.
items.content_html:
Color / Diagnostics

  • koenverburg/peepsight.nvim (⭐118) - Focus only the function your cursor is in.

Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

  • theniceboy/nvim-deus (⭐72) - Vim-deus with Tree-sitter support.

Utility / Diagnostics

  • crusj/bookmarks.nvim (⭐240) - Remember file locations and sort by time and frequency.
  • xiyaowong/virtcolumn.nvim (⭐94) - Display a line as colorcolumn.

items.title: Awesome Crystal
items.content_text:
### Logging and monitoring

*   [fiber\_metrics.cr (⭐8)](https://github.com/didactic-drunk/fiber_metrics.cr) - Track run time, wait time, or memory allocations per `Fiber`, method or block
items.content_html:
Logging and monitoring

  • fiber_metrics.cr (⭐8) - Track run time, wait time, or memory allocations per Fiber, method or block
